og.description: By Kristy Zurbrick Madison County Editor Since its introduction 47 years ago, the Metro Parks Winter Hike Series has morphed into a massive event. Thousands of people now show up for the hikes which take place in January and February at 13 of the system’s 19 parks. Participants are treated to guided and self-guided hikes, …
